column2: Self-portrait wearing a bright straw hat against a dark blue background.
Framed by the iconic yellow straw hat, the artist's intense gaze emerges from a churning backdrop of deep indigo and turquoise, capturing the vibrant sun and restless spirit of Arles.
A self-portrait with serious expression and light blue background.
The artist's face, sculpted in thick strokes of ochre and orange, is set against a serene yet textured field of pale blue, revealing a quiet, penetrating introspection.
Iconic self-portrait with a bandaged ear and a pipe.
Against a dramatic, fiery backdrop of red and orange, the artist holds a pipe, his bandaged ear a visible mark of his solitary struggle, rendered with resolute dignity.
A dense study of forest trees and lush green foliage.
Three strong tree trunks anchor a canvas vibrating with countless green and yellow brushstrokes, capturing the shimmering, restless light filtering through the summer canopy.
Rooftops and a winding road in a village under a bright yellow sky.
The village path dips dramatically between thatched rooftops and thick, stylized shrubbery, all bathed in the consuming, urgent yellow light of a Southern French day.
Self-portrait with a yellow straw hat and red beard.
Sunlight bursts from the brim of his yellow hat, illuminating the passionate red-gold of his beard against a background of white and red swirls—a fearless embrace of color and light.
The terrace of the Yellow House in Arles with potted plants.
The sun-drenched facade of the Yellow House is a stage for the contrast between brilliant chrome and cool, mint-green shutters, defining the hopeful sanctuary Van Gogh sought in Arles.
A close-up view of forest undergrowth in autumn colors.
A densely woven tapestry of foliage and earth, where thousands of small, restless dabs of green, gold, and brown capture the electric texture and organic decay of the forest floor.
Intense self-portrait in a blue jacket against a violet background.
The artist's face, defined by stark highlights and shadows, emerges from a stormy, churning sea of violet and deep blue brushstrokes, capturing a look of profound, restless intensity.
The Langlois Drawbridge with a boat and laundresses on the bank.
The famous wooden drawbridge arches over the cobalt water, simplifying the working figures and landscape into broad, vibrant planes of color, reminiscent of Japanese prints.
Self-portrait wearing a yellow straw hat and bright yellow jacket.

Bathed in the radiant, sun-drenched palette of Arles, the artist's face emerges from the luminous chaos of the background, crowned by a wide yellow brim—a study in brilliant light and self-confrontation.
Self-portrait in a straw hat with a dark jacket and bow tie.
Against a restless, dark-hued background, the artist, sporting a simple hat and tie, employs bold contrast to bring out the piercing intensity of his eyes and the texture of his sun-weathered face.
A yellow stone tunnel entrance on a winding road.
The road beckons toward the dark, compressed mystery of the tunnel mouth, while the surrounding earth and autumn foliage explode in a frenzy of thick, expressive strokes of yellow and orange.
Still life painting of vibrant pink and white hydrangeas.
Against a simmering background of burnt orange, the clustered blossoms of pink and white hydrangeas are rendered with frantic energy, capturing a powerful, short-lived burst of summer life and color.
A terra cotta pot holding tall green and red grasses.
A humble still life where life bursts forth; the pot's clay texture contrasts with the aggressively vertical blades of grass, set before a background of rich, striped color.
A line of trees along a road or canal bank under a yellow sky.
Beneath a pale, streaky sky, the sturdy, dark trees stand sentinel over a bright bank of agitated green and yellow grass, casting a sense of movement over the quiet roadside.
Stone bridge over a river with boats and green banks.
The ancient stone arches of the bridge cross the wide river, whose surface shimmers with the choppy, reflective gold and ochre of the sunlight, capturing a calm, yet dynamic landscape.
Self-portrait with red beard and a dark, moody background.
A powerful, unflinching self-study; the fiery red beard and intense eyes emerge from the abyss of the blue-black background, portraying the artist's serious and contemplative mood.
Self-portrait with a straw hat, pipe, and blue jacket.
In somber, heavy shadow, the artist's determined gaze holds the viewer; the muted blue jacket and worn straw hat are secondary to the solitary focus conveyed by the pipe and the intense expression.
A still life painting of three golden-brown fish.
A dramatic rendering of dead fish, whose scales catch the light with thick strokes of shimmering gold and white, set against a dark, churning background—a poignant study of common, textured beauty.
Self-portrait in a straw hat with a dynamic, brushstroke-filled background.

Beneath the wide brim of a vibrant yellow straw hat, the artist's face is a study in raw honesty, painted in quick, rhythmic strokes against a swirling, earthy backdrop that pulses with contained energy.
Self-portrait with a light grey jacket and red tie detail.
A close-up of penetrating eyes and an agitated expression; the skin is mapped out in agitated swirls of color, set against an equally restless background of deep emerald and slate blue.
A wide field of cut wheat, stacked into sheaves under a bright sky.
The ground is a blinding field of pure yellow, defined by energetic vertical strokes, contrasting sharply with the deep blue sky, a vibrant ode to the heat and labor of the Provençal harvest.
An aerial view of a farmhouse and undulating terraced fields.
The landscape is fragmented into dizzying planes of color—ochre fields, fiery orange soil, and dark cypress spires—all leading the eye towards the solitary, brightly lit farmhouse below.
Trees in an orchard covered in white and green blossoms.
A celebration of spring's fragile renewal; the rough, dark branches of the fruit trees support an ethereal cloud of pale blossoms above a carpet of vibrant, vertical green grass.
A white house with green shutters seen under a cloudy, moonlit sky.
Under a turbulent, indigo night sky, the white house stands brightly illuminated, framed by deep shadows and cypress trees, with the moon a luminous, swirling disc overhead.
A still life of a crab on a green background.
The crab's hard shell, painted in rich browns and reds, lies against a deeply textured, agitated background of emerald and olive green—a powerful, unsentimental study of natural form.
A lush, overgrown riverbank with a stone bridge visible in the distance.
The foreground dissolves into a flickering pattern of white wildflowers and bright green leaves, creating a vibrant, dense barrier through which the quiet arch of a stone bridge is glimpsed.
A view of a bridge over the Seine River in Paris with distant buildings.
An early Parisian view of the Seine, where the stone arches of the bridge lead to the architectural density of the city, rendered in muted, earthy tones with quick, observational strokes.
